item.title: Equity Fund Outflows Are Highest in Almost a Year: ESG Investing
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- About $9 billion was withdrawn from ESG-focused equity funds last month, the most in almost a year, according to research from Barclays Plc.
